sense.def: Alternative Names dan shi yao du 丹石藥 毒 , cinnabar [et al.] mineral drug poison; jin shi du 金石毒 , mineral substance poison; jin shi yao du 金石藥毒 , mineral drug poison. Etiological Agent. Combined Designation of all poisonous mineral drugs be they chemically refined or not. Yao xing lun 藥性論 Substance Entry che qian zi 車前子：壓丹石毒，去心胸煩熱 , “To suppress cinnabar [et al.] mineral poison and to remove vexing heat from heart and chest”.
